imgs.text: Fishers Island One Design photo on sailboatdata.com

name: FISHERS ISLAND ONE DESIGN
notes:
Sailed at Fishers Island for 10 years, after which they were sold as a fleet to Gibson Island YS on Chesapeake Bay. 
Originally gaff rigged sloops. Re-rigged as Marconi/Bermudian sloops in 1929.
At least 14 still survive and race as a fleet at Groton Long Point YC in Connecticut. (no contact information found.)
Original plans are part of the Charles D. Mower Collection at the Mystic Seaport Museum.
